data.text: @anupaksh In this case, we would like to inform you that, if you have booked your ticket through an agency, you have to contact your agency in order to make any alterations to your ticket. Please note that fees may be applied depending on the terms and conditions of your ticket.
@eggleton_kelly Greetings, if your flight is departing from Thailand, you do not have to present any additional documents.

@JohnMac65407979 Greetings, we suggest that you contact our THAI local offices near you for further assistance at https://t.co/p86rp7UJpR However, if you have booked your ticket through an agency, you have to contact your agency in order to make any alterations to your ticket.
@michaelbrookerr Hello. We suggest that you contact our THAI Contact Center at +662-356-1111 (24 hours) and press 911 for English assistance or send an email to contact@service.thaiairways.com
